commandDefinition.name: Convert To html
commandDefinition.command: $a = "<style>" $a = $a + "HEAD{}" $a = $a + "TABLE{border-width: 1px;border-style: solid;border-color: black;border-collapse: collapse;}" $a = $a + "TH{border-width: 1px;padding: 0px;border-style: solid;border-color: black;background-color:#CEE6FF;color:black}" $a = $a + "TD{border-width: 1px;padding: 0px;border-style: solid;border-color: black;background-color:#ffffff;color:black;font: 15px arial}" $a = $a + "</style>" Get-Content "c:\Aggregate_Report.csv" | Select -skip 0 | ConvertFrom-CSV | ConvertTo-HTML -Head $a |Out-File "C:\Aggregate_Report.html" Get-Content "c:\Volume_Report.csv" | Select -skip 0 | ConvertFrom-CSV | ConvertTo-HTML -Head $a |Out-File "C:\Volume_Report.html" Get-Content "c:\Aggr_Vol_Report.csv" | Select -skip 0 | ConvertFrom-CSV | ConvertTo-HTML -Head $a |Out-File "C:\Aggr_Vol_Report.html"
